title: My verdict on updated Ezreal
body:
https://media.giphy.com/media/pjcGtuhGacij9R9wMm/giphy.gif

Seriously well done Riot.  You've made hybrid stronger than ever, kept him true to his character while expanding on him a ton, and gave him the look he totally deserves.  This Freelo Explorer abuser gives full seal of approval to this VGU.

Take notes for your next rework that there is a lot of importance that needs to be placed on preserving what people love about a champion, not just for popular champs, but for all champs.  Can't wait for next rework and may it preferably be someone more deserving 

-cough- {{champion:82}} -cough-
